titleStmt.title: To all and singular justices of peace, maiors, sheriffes,d bailiffes, and other her Maiesties officers, &c. whereas her Maiestie hath bene credibly informed, that notwithstanding there is great plenty of woolls within this realme, whereby the same ought to be solde at conuenient and reasonable prices ...
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Privy Council.

publicationStmt.publisher: By Robert Barker, Printer to the Queenes most excellent Maiestie,

notesStmt.note: Other title information from first 3 lines of text.
"From the court at Greenewich the eight and twentieth day of Iune, in the xliiii. yeere of her Maiesties Raigne."
Signed at end: Jo. Cant., Tho. Egerton. C.S. [and 10 others].
Reproduction of original in: Society of Antiquaries.
